item.description:
Helping the Elderly on Christmas Day

Event: In the spirit of the holiday season, join us as we serve meals to residents of senior housing located near Symphony Hall. Help set up, take orders, serve food and clean-up, while making new friends with the residents of this complex. There is a particular need for clean-up, which we've been asked to assist with.

Contact: Debbie

Meet: Christmas Day, Dec. 25, at 11:30 a.m. at , 100 Norway St., Boston, MA 02115, (Cross streets, between Whipple Street/Stoneholm Street and Edgerly Road/Public Alley 904.) Lots of parking on Mass Avenue, a short walk away.

RSVP: Please RSVP by Wednesday, Dec. 21.

Cost: None
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements to meet Debbie

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A Chance to Volunteer on Christmas
